welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Santa Cruz Michapa, a charming city known for its rich culture and friendly locals. Get ready to experience the beauty and warmth of our city and all it has to offer. Have a wonderful stay and enjoy exploring our vibrant community!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ilopango International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ilopango International Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is the main terminal at El Salvador International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is located next to Terminal A.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.
